text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft was now acting as Fusaichi Pandora's instructor. 
The next day——

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I already need your advice Trainer-san～……!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
When I really think about it, on Team <Ascella> 
I've always been more of a kouhai……When it comes to 
teaching others, I don't have very much experience～

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
How should I put it? I have no idea what I should start with～! 
I just feel like I don't understand anything……!

For now, I'll lend you some beginner 
level teaching materials. However——

For now, I'll lend you some beginner 
level teaching materials. However——

When it comes to an 『Uma Musume training another Uma Musume』…… 
Don't you have someone even more suitable you can ask about that?

When it comes to an 『Uma Musume training another Uma Musume』…… 
Don't you have someone even more suitable you can ask about that?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Eh? ……Ah!! 
……Oooh～……!!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan! 
We're gonna go play over there～!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, have fun. 
Make sure you don't go too far——Oh, huh?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu, Kraft, she wrote in the exchange diary. 
Let's see……? …………!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
——『Kraft, it's awesome that you got assigned as an instructor! 
If you're fine with me, I'd be happy to give you advice』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『Based on what you've told me about her…… 
She sounds like an incredibly capable girl, so she 
probably rarely ever thinks "I want to try!" does she?』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『If you can do everything from the start, then you probably 
never truly experience a sense of accomplishment or excitement…… 
and it might lead to never truly "Wanting" something』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『So then maybe the first thing you should do is find out 
from her what it is she "Wants". How about starting there?』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
——Um, so then……! First, Pandora-san, let's start with a training 
menu that you want to try out. Do you have anything in mind!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Eh, is it fine to choose anything!? Alright～☆ Then, then, 
I want to go outside the school with Ku-chan-senpai～!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
The weather's really nice today and it's a lot cooler so♡ 
Don't you think a run towards the mountains might feel great?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Outside, on a mountain course……Yeah, let's go, let's go! 
Then, I'll teach you some tricks for hills!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『To find out what she "Wants" it's 
important to talk to her a lot, so——』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『Praise her lots～. It'd be great if she started thinking 
"This is fun!" and "Maybe I should try more things?"』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
『And——it's really simple but, maybe 
try preparing some kind of reward?』

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
——Really? Does it really feel that good? 
Is sun-bathing at the peak……that crazy?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's crazy……! So let's keep working hard for a bit more. Normally 
this is the end of the course, but just a little further! Okay?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Nnnnnn～……Let's do it～!! 
Don't look down on a Genius～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Fufuu……! Let's do it～～～!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
——I see. Then, after taking advice from Cesario-san, 
it sounds like your role as instructor is going smoothly now.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Together, it seems like she's working 
harder than before……I think! ……Probably……!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! I think you can be more confident in yourself, Kraft. Lately, 
that girl occasionally works with the dumbbells in our dorm room.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
It's an amazing transformation! ——Though, I wish she'd 
give me a break and clean up after herself so she doesn't 
keep tripping and making a huge scene every time.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
……After hearing all that, she sounds like a really troublesome girl. 
Kraft-san, it's not interfering with your training adjustments, is it?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
At the 『Hanshin Uma Musume S』 I was defeated. 
So at the 『Victoria Mile』 I'll be looking to get even.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, there's no problem there! Training together 
with Pandora-san is also helping me get stronger.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's why, I won't lose. I won't let you take this distance. 
The Spring Mile Queen——will be me for sure!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(……And besides. 
I want to show it to Pandora-san——)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Huu, Huuu……Nnnnnnn～……!! 
……～～～～Haaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fuwah～……Pandora-san, how was it……? 
I didn't mess up on my form, did I?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it was super clean! But senpai, your muscle strength is amazing～ 
……So this is why your starting acceleration is so crazy, huh～.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right! Since Pandora-san is also the type 
to aim for a good position in the front, do you want 
to do this together? It's fine even if you start small.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Hmm～……No, just like that is fine! Just watch 
me Ku-chan-senpai. I've got plenty of power too!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Fufu. ……Looks like things are going pretty smoothly 
between Kraft-san and Pandora-san, aren't they?
choice_data_list: Yeah, they've built up a good rapport
Yeah, they've built up a good rapport

text_block_list.text:
They became a lot closer than I expected……and lately it 
seems like Kraft is almost always together with Pandora.

They became a lot closer than I expected……and lately it 
seems like Kraft is almost always together with Pandora.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……? What is it?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hmph, Gunununununununu……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: DOSEEEEEEEEI!

(Kawakami Princess……today too, she's vigorously training. 
Probably being fueled by her admiration for King)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Listen here. At the 『Oaks』 she's going to be Pandora-san's 
rival you know? There's no way I can just talk to her.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It's fine. ……She'll be fine.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Brilliance. Soul. 
I believe, I've shown her all she needs to see.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's more than enough. 
……That's all she needs to run. That's Kawakami Princess.

(King——doesn't go over to her. She just remains here. Even so, 
King's legacy was surely engraved in to that girl's entire being)

(On our end, Kraft was there for Pandora. 
……A connection between Uma Musume, born from 
admiration——It was just one of many forms it could take)

(On our end, Kraft was there for Pandora. 
……A connection between Uma Musume, born from 
admiration——It was just one of many forms it could take)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Alright. Then, Pandora-san! Now for some parallel running 
geared for the 『Victoria Mile』, if you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Okay okay♪ 
I won't go easy on you though, Ku-chan-senpai～.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, just what I want to hear! 
Then, let's……get started!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Pandora
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Crazy, she took the front! Seriously, Ku-chan-senpai 
just takes the best position from the start so smoothly～!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Ngugugugu……but, the last leg! 
I'll take things from here——Uryaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Not yet!! ——I won't let you!! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Geh!? Ku, she's……too gutsy～～～……!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Buhaaa! Haa, haa, haa……haa. 
……Amazing. I couldn't……get in front at all～……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Huuuーーー……thank you, Pandora-san! 
Good work out there today.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna keep going for a little bit longer……you can head out first! 
Make sure you get a good rest, okay～!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? S-seriously!? You're gonna keep going? After all that? 
Haaaa～～～……you're working really hard, Senpai……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: …………No, seriously……you know.

And so the days passed——and finally. 
Rhein Kraft's 『Victoria Mile』 had arrived.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Under this overcast sky, who will the goddess of 
victory——"Victoria" smile upon? This is the 
Spring Mile Queen Championship, the 『Victoria Mile』

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Last year's 『NHK Mile C』 winner, obtaining the Unorthodox 
Double Crown, Rhein Kraft, is the number one favorite.

After 13 races, this is your first one where the 
track is not in good condition…… Kraft, don't think 
too much about it. Just do what you normally do.

After 13 races, this is your first one where the 
track is not in good condition…… Kraft, don't think 
too much about it. Just do what you normally do.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, thank you very much! 
……Alright. It's about time I get going!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
——Pandora-san. 
I'll show you my cool side, okay!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Aha, yeah! I'm really～ looking forward to it♡ 
Go get 'em, Ku-chan-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer, afterwards let's go get crepes, crepes♡ 
To celebrate Ku-chan-senpai's victory! I know a good place!

Afterwards, huh……now, now. The race is about to start. 
It's too early to think about victory celebrations.

Afterwards, huh……now, now. The race is about to start. 
It's too early to think about victory celebrations.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Huuuuh～? C'mon, what are you saying Trainer!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Because she's that amazing, and she worked so hard, right? 
Ku-chan-senpai's win is already in the bag!

Even then……it's not a guarantee that she'll win. 
That's just how races are, Pandora.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Now, shrouded by a heavy atmosphere, 
the final Uma Musume——enters her gate.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(……It's fine. I'm calm. 
Just like always, I'll match my timing——)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (And run!!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Ah……eh? Why, now——!?)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
With 200m remaining, Daring Heart moves foward! 
From the outside, it's Air Messiah!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Eh……eh? Wait, no way——!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft is pressing hard, but can't pull away! 
Air Messiah moves in to second! However, first place is——!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Unexpectedly, the favorite, Rhein Kraft, is off the board 
for the first time! Her placement is a surprising 9th!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Ninth……wait, hold on! 
Wait, that can't be right!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Because senpai…… 
Worked so hard……but even then……
